Name: Tofu Maps
Tagline: Create personal maps you can share without accounts
Description: ofu Maps lets you create personal maps, save places, and share them by link ‚Äî without signing up. Perfect for travel ideas, city guides, filming locations, or personal collections of places. Simple, fast, and privacy-first.

Name: Updatest
Tagline: Your new home for Mac updates.
Topics: Mac, Developer Tools, Menu Bar Apps
Description: Updatest is a Mac app that unifies updates from Homebrew, Mac App Store, Sparkle, Electron, and GitHub Releases into one clean dashboard. Discover outdated apps, adopt manual installs into Homebrew, get security details, and bulk‚Äëupdate with confidence‚Äîno sketchy update databases, your data stays local.

Name: OS Ninja
Tagline: Explore and learn open source using AI
Topics: Open Source, Software Engineering, Developer Tools
Description: Our goal is simple but ambitious: to make deep-diving into code feel more like an adventure! Most of us know that Open Source is the backbone of the modern web, but finding the right project to learn from or contribute to can feel like searching for a needle in a digital haystack. Not anymore. We turn complex code repositories into interactive, AI-guided learning journeys. Choose how you learn best: Deep-dive, Socratic, Feynman, or traditional book format. No more 'wall of information' fatigue.

Name: Soch
Tagline: Turn passive scrolling into active discovery
Description: We scroll every day, why not learn something meaningful? Soch curates research articles using AI and presents them in a familiar, effortless feed. With simplified summaries, AI-generated visuals, and personalized interests, discovery feels natural, not overwhelming. Turn mindless scrolling into moments of insight.

Name: 21st Fund
Tagline: Agentic Grant Discovery for Founders
Description: Discover non-dilutive funding, grants, and credits with AI-powered insights. By 21st.fund

Name: Moshi
Tagline: the mobile interface for AI coding agents
Description: Moshi lets you run coding agents like Claude Code from your iPhone. Agents need frequent input, but you can't always be at your desk. Moshi connects directly to your dev machine over Mosh ‚Äî resilient UDP connections that survive network changes and device sleep. Speak commands with on-device Whisper instead of typing. One-tap shortcuts for Claude Code. Face ID for your keys. No cloud, no subscription ‚Äî just you and your terminal.

Name: FlowGenie
Tagline: Make building forms and automating workflows feel like magic
Description: FlowGenie is a no-code platform for building forms and workflows using a visual, node-based flow editor. Inspired by Unreal Engine blueprints, logic lives in the graph, not hidden inside config panels. Build flows you can schedule, trigger externally, or run from form submissions. Designed for developers, founders, and technical teams who want automation without giving up clarity or control.

Name: Honter
Tagline: Run design projects like a studio, even if you‚Äôre solo
Description: Honter is a workspace built specifically for designers to collaborate with clients in a structured, professional way. Instead of juggling emails, PDFs and scattered comments, designers manage briefs, moodboards, versions, feedback, and deliveries in one clear flow. Each workspace is designed around how real design projects actually work. AI is used quietly in the background to help clarify client feedback and draft quick responses, so designers spend less time managing and more time designing.

Name: Internet Makes Music
Tagline: A public, global music experiment. Completely free
Description: Anybody can place a pixel that produces sound, and anybody can listen to the result. The public experiment that I want to show to the world. Works on any device (Phone, Desktop). So, can strangers create music just by placing pixels?

Name: Coderrr
Tagline: Open source CLI-first AI coding companion
Topics: Open Source, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence, GitHub
Description: A powerful CLI tool that writes, debugs, and ships code alongside you. Like Claude Code, but free and open source. AI-powered coding agent that analyzes tasks, creates actionable plans, and executes commands.

Name: Freeport
Tagline: Intelligent DeFi Investment Platform
Description: Freeport is an intelligent DeFi investment platform that helps you earn yield and build diversified crypto portfolios in one place. It combines AI and human expertise to surface trusted opportunities, reduce fees, and make long-term DeFi investing simple and explainable.

Name: NotchDrop
Tagline: Access todo list, files, clipboard + more on the Notch
Description: NotchDrop transforms your MacBook notch into a smart productivity center. Instantly drop and share files, access clipboard history, control music, record your screen, and annotate screenshots all in one seamless place. Share files locally across macOS, Windows, Android, and iOS without internet or cloud uploads. No app switching, no interruptions. Built native for macOS with lightning-fast performance and a clean experience. Turn unused space into your secret workflow weapon. One-time purchase.

Name: Noodle Seed
Tagline: Connect your business to AI conversations in minutes
Description: Get discovered where your customers are already searching. Build your branded AI app in minutes. No code needed. Start with ChatGPT, where 800M+ people search every week. Expand to other platforms as they open their app stores. Capture leads, book appointments, and sell products. Generate FAQs and testimonials with AI. Upload docs to make your app smarter. Sync to HubSpot automatically. Your customers are asking AI for recommendations. Be the answer.

Name: flins
Tagline: The universal skill and command manager for AI coding tools
Topics: Open Source, Developer Tools, Artificial Intelligence
Description: Agent Skills is now an open standard, but each AI agent manages skills differently, making multi-agent workflows hard to maintain. flins acts as a dependency manager for agent skills, similar to npm. With commands like flins add, update, remove, list, and search, developers can manage skills consistently across multiple AI coding agents.

Name: Mac Cleanup Go
Tagline: Terminal-based Mac cleaner where you choose what goes
Description: Most Mac cleaners work like a black box‚Äîyou click "clean" and hope for the best. This one shows you exactly what it finds: file paths, sizes, and categories. You pick what goes, and everything moves to Trash. Terminal-based, open source.

Name: Quetzly
Tagline: Test, monitor, and visualize your location APIs in one place
Description: Quetzly helps developers, GIS and IT teams test, monitor, and visualize geospatial APIs. Send http requests, adjust headers and query params, and inspect JSON with an integrated editor. Render WMS, WFS, GeoJSON and ArcGIS services on an interactive map, toggle layers, zoom to extents, and export data as GeoJSON or Shapefile. Track endpoint health to reduce downtime and keep location services reliable. Quetzly is currently in open Beta. Try it for free.

Name: LiveSyncDesk
Tagline: Real time collaboration with a mobile synchronized board
Description: LiveSyncDesk is your private shared space for friendly discussion, teaching, and explaining with images or synchronized board drawing in real time. Start a board, invite anyone with a link, and stay perfectly in sync while you sketch ideas, upload images, and use Synchronized Zoom to focus on the exact details together. Whether it‚Äôs online teaching, quick team discussions, or remote reviews, LiveSyncDesk is a personal project by an independent developer under active development.

Name: IndexMachine
Tagline: A lightweight and super fast page indexer that just works
Description: Stuck in "Crawled: currently not indexed"? IndexMachine automatically submits your pages to Google, Bing, and now even to LLMs like ChatGPT (so your content shows up in AI answers, not just search results). It tracks everything, sends you daily reports, and alerts you when pages 404. You just connect your domains and let it run on autopilot.

Name: Slates
Tagline: Presentation Primitive for MCPs
Description: Slides for LLMs. AI-powered presentations.Slates is built from scratch for agents, not adapted from human-first tools. JSON-native: Presentations are structured data. Grid layouts: No pixel coordinates. Agents pick templates and fill content ‚Äî the grid handles design. MCP-first: One connection and any agent can create presentations programmatically. Existing tools are retrofitted for programmatic access. Slates assumes the agent is the primary user from day one.

Name: Free Agent Skill Builder
Tagline: Build Professional Agent Skills in Seconds
Description: Skill Builder turns raw ideas, docs, and files into real, usable AI agent capabilities, ready to plug into your workflows in seconds. Skill Builder helps you create professional agent skills without writing specs, schemas, or boilerplate. Just: 1. ‚úçÔ∏è Describe what you want 2. üìé Drop your files 3. ‚ö° Generate a ready-to-use skill package That‚Äôs it.
